dmca.title: Ashes to Ashes, Dust to Dust, Pendant to Pendant
dmca.body:
Trademark MEMORY PENDANTS
Reg. No.: 3279990

Dear [Private]:
I represent [L. Huffman Studios] in connection with certain trademark matters. As you know, my client is the owner of U.S. Reg. No. 3279990 for the mark MEMORY PENDANTS for fused glass pendants with a small amount of crematory ash fused between the layers of glass. My client has used the mark since at least 2003.

It has come to my attention that you are the registrant of record of the MEMORYPENDANTS.COM domain name. Your registration of this domain name, which contains my clients MEMORY PENDANTS trademark and trade name, is likely to cause confusion and infringes upon and dilutes my client
